title: Apple tries to pump up developers
contentencoded:
Apple kicks off its annual World Wide Developer's Conference today. Much of the buzz so far has been about new services that may be announced for consumers. But at the end of the day, WWDC is for developers. What are they hoping for?

Marco Arment, co-founder of Tumblr and creator of Instapaper, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to explain what's at the top of his wishlist. 

Want to hear more? Click on the audio player below to listen to our full interview with Marco Arment.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, June 10, 2013
description: We know what consumers want from Apple, but what about developers?
